prompt:
THEME: Sweet Candy Kingdom

STYLE:
- Everything made of candy, sweets, and desserts
- Bright pastel colors: pink, mint, yellow, lavender
- Cute and whimsical, Candyland board game vibes
- Wreck-It Ralph Sugar Rush aesthetic

ASSET DETAILS:
- Grass: FLAT frosting ground tile only - smooth pink frosting texture with rainbow sprinkles, no structures
- House: Gingerbread house with icing trim, gumdrop decorations
- Shop: Candy shop made of lollipops, chocolate, hard candy
- Park: Candy garden with cotton candy trees, lollipop flowers
- University: Chocolate castle academy with wafer towers
- Market: Sweet market with candy cane stalls, dessert vendors
